Do values in a numeric vector fall in specified range?

Source: R/between.R
between.Rd

This is a shortcut for x >= left & x <= right.

Usage

between(x, left, right)

Arguments

x

A numeric vector of values.

left, right

Boundary values.

Value

A logical vector the same length as x.

Examples

between(1:12, 7, 9)
#>  [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE

x <- rnorm(1e2)
x[between(x, -1, 1)]
#>  [1] -0.05846341  0.53370337  0.15231769 -0.76214958  0.27167119 -0.19594199
#>  [7]  0.15162572 -0.59701653 -0.10181186 -0.11500954 -0.49260722 -0.10569278
#> [13] -0.34932272  0.89802157  0.55196365 -0.31545585  0.72843471 -0.13104980
#> [19]  0.07496207 -0.86789568 -0.46310499  0.24923183 -0.18111159  0.04619329
#> [25]  0.71607524 -0.25342372 -0.04255147 -0.40432699 -0.70831990 -0.13656123
#> [31] -0.91005808 -0.45586604  0.90879871  0.45611574  0.92067558 -0.52634972
